subject: Re: Possible shifter warranty claim
description_text:
Hi

Forst of all - thank you for replying.

But - I received the device application 13th...reported it 2 weeks later.
It's June 1st..and I can't do normal RMA with you!!!! It's insane.

And again - I dont want to fix it on my own, don't se d me any videos, It's
not my responsibility.

Se d me shipment label to pack the device a d send it for RMA.

Pawel

On Sun, Jun 1, 2025, 2:29 PM support <support@simsonn.com> wrote:

>
> Dear Pawel,
>
>
> This is the SIMSONN after-sales support team. We sincerely apologize that
> your message was previously handled by our sales staff and was not promptly
> forwarded to our after-sales email (support@simsonn.com).
>
>
> I have reviewed your issue regarding the sequential gear adjustment nut.
> Under normal circumstances, this part is very difficult to damage. Only
> incorrect adjustment of the main locking nut could potentially cause both
> the internal and external screws to loosen, which would then prevent proper
> adjustment of the positioning ball.
>
>
> As we are currently on the Dragon Boat Festival holiday, we will be able
> to record and send you a video on June 3rd, showing our proposed solution.
> We will attempt to re-tighten the nut and would like to confirm whether we
> have correctly understood your concern.
>
>
> Thank you for your patience and continued support.
>
>
> Best regards,
>
> SIMSONN Support Team
> ​
> ---- 回复的原邮件 ----
> 发件人 General and sales enquiries<service@simsonn.com> <service@simsonn.com>
> 发送日期 2025年06月01日 20:03

conversations.body_text:
Hey

A) this is what I structures say and this is what I tried to do when I
realized one side works, the other doesnt (attached picture). The screws on
one side were loose (outside so as inside).

B) I have pedals and handbrake from you too (picture of pedals also
attached - so you can see I tuned them to my linking, different
elastometers, angles, spring, took out one of dumpings). I ALWAYS FOLLOW
THE INSTRUCTION.

C) Please read my conversation from precious claim (that you stated was
with sales person). That person told me to try things against the
instruction LYING!!!! THATS HOW IT SHOULD BE DONE ( basically exposing me
to brake the product). YOU SHOULD LOOK INTO THAT!!!!

D) I don't want a refund, I got a great deal for it with my discounts from
previous purchases. I want my product. You ship me broken product, fix it,

STOP THIS BULLSHIT!!

Also, as you can see at attached picture I have haptics from Simagic
installed, sinne they have problems with stock I decided to sell it and buy
your VAM modules for all 3 pedals

Not anymore, I bought pedals, handbrake, shifter, additional accesories etc
within 3 months - after all that BS from you, I'm not buying a single thing
anymore.

You basically lost returning customer.

Now, last time I ask - WILL YOU FIX MY PRODUCT UNDER THE WARRANTY LIKE YOU
SHOULD?

Pawel

Hi

I thought that was clear from the start. I wanted my unit to work,  that's
it. I like the hardware amd want to keep using it. That's it.

Thank you very much.

Regards
Pawel

Hello

Thank you once again and the address is:

Pawel Pekala
Gotlandstrasse 10c
10439 Berlin

I'll record the whole procedure of adjustment this time, I want it to be
stiffer, hope not to encourage ter any issues with this one.

Thank you

Best regards
Pawel

Hi

Since it seems you'll solve my situation I'm thinking about ordering VAM
haptics for my pedals. Maybe we could add ot to the package with
replacement shifter so I save on the shipment cost?

Few things:

1. Do I need the power supply? I have 1 already amd the specs are right I
think, it also fits my control box on Pro X (please see attached pictures).

2. Is there any way I could avoid additional taxes? I know it's possible
from 250$ and more and my modules would be around 110$ (2x VAM pro + 1xVAM)
bymut I though the shifter (replacement) value is 160$...there would be a
way around it... just asking

3. My order would look like that - please see attached picture)

Thank you for replying in advance

Best

Pawel

Thank you,

I know VAM modules will be available since June 10th so there's no rush
with the shipment.

Do you know if I could find the answet to other two questions? (Tax and
power suply)

Refards
Pawel

Great, answer for tax is "NO" I understand? :)

Regards
Pawel

I totally understand. Once again, no rush, VAM pro ships from June 10th so
there's still time.

Thank you very much for your assistance. Looking forward to hear from you

Best regards
Pawel

Si, ya le he aplicado grasa de litio y aún así siguen con el sonido, no tan tan fuerte, pero siguen sonando y el clic no será la activación de la célula de carga?
Sobre la tira de led... Necesitaría instrucciones muy detalladas de como cambiarlas, ya que no sabría ni por donde empezar

Enviado desde Outlook para Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

Hi Paul Pekala,  We have shipped a new sequential shifter today. It does not include the handle, as the handle is too heavy, and you can continue using your existing one. We used express shipping, and the tracking number is: JSEXS0480253977YQ. You can place a separate order for either the VAM or VAM Pro. If you're using the standard ProX controller, we recommend purchasing the VAM. The VAM Pro requires the ProX Ultra board for full performance, and its vibration strength will be weaker on the regular ProX.
